title: Half made bowl

properties.name: description
properties.value: A half made bowl is an intermediate step in all gnomebowl-based gnome cooking. It is created after adding the initial set of ingredients to a half baked bowl. It needs to be baked again to create an unfinished bowl, or the final dish when making tangled toad's legs, and also releases the gnomebowl mould back into your inventory for reuse.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Half made bowl

A half made bowl is an intermediate step in all gnomebowl-based gnome cooking. It is created after adding the initial set of ingredients to a half baked bowl. It needs to be baked again to create an unfinished bowl, or the final dish when making tangled toad's legs, and also releases the gnomebowl mould back into your inventory for reuse.

  • Half made bowl (worm hole)
  • Half made bowl (veg ball)
  • Half made bowl (tangled toad's legs)
  • Half made bowl (chocolate bomb)
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
A '''half made bowl''' is an intermediate step in all gnomebowl-based [[gnome cooking]]. It is created after adding the initial set of ingredients to a [[half baked bowl]]. It needs to be baked again to create an [[unfinished bowl]], or the final dish when making [[tangled toad's legs]], and also releases the [[gnomebowl mould]] back into your [[inventory]] for reuse.
*[[Half made bowl (worm hole)]]
*[[Half made bowl (veg ball)]]
*[[Half made bowl (tangled toad's legs)]]
*[[Half made bowl (chocolate bomb)]]
